Phobia winced at the kindness KitKat was showing, she was showing yo 
much gratitude where a leader should merely show adaquacy (I think 
thats the right term)

"Of course leader, here you are." he extended his hand and offered 
the holocube to KitKat. "Now if you'll excuse me I have some business 
to attend to on my ship. If you'd like to stop out later, I'll be 
glad to supply a manifest of my cargo." Phobia steps back carefully 
trying not to undermind his new superior. he awaits her approval 
before exiting.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She looked at Drill bit as he came into her room. She smiled at 
> him,"Thank you Drillbit. That was awefully sweet of you to do this 
> for me. Thank you." 
> 
> She turned to Phobia, "If you have those plans, they will come in 
> handy."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::DrillBit::
> > 
> > DrillBit walked to where KitKat and Phobia are.
> > "Hey, you looked really down, so I came to cheer you up." He said 
to
> > KitKat.
> > 
> > ::Hot Rod::
> > 
> > Hot Rod walked out of the brig, and outside the Ark. He saw that 
> the Ark
> > was in pretty bad shape. It would have to be tottaly rebuilt, in 
> order
> > to keep history in tackt. And the Autobots would have to be 
found. 
> He
> > decided to stay, incase of another attack.
> > 
> > OOC: Are the Decepticons in the cave where Megatron's Pred's are?
